record.title: HAZARDOUS WASTE ELECTRONIC MANIFEST ESTABLISHMENT ACT
record.narrative:
HAZARDOUS WASTE ELECTRONIC MANIFEST ESTABLISHMENT ACT -- (Senate - September 26, 2008)

[Page: S9874]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of Calendar No. 1039, S. 3109.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 3109) to amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a hazardous waste electronic manifest system.
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Thune amendment, which is at the desk, be agreed to, the bill, as amended, be read a third time and passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating to the bill be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
record.narrative: (The amendment is printed in today's Record under "Text of Amendments.")
The bill (S. 3109), as amended, was ordered to be engrossed for a third reading, was read the third time, and passed.
